paper.title: Estimation of Regulation Reserve Requirement Based on Control Performance Standard
paper.abstract: This paper proposes a method to estimate the real-time regulation reserve requirement based on the NERC Control Performance Standard (CPS). This method is constructed via three steps: first, a Multiple Linear Regression (MLR) model is applied to abstract the relationship between CPS and regulation reserve and other system conditions using training observations generated from a load frequency control model; second, a stepwise method with cross validation is used to select the most relevant features of MLR; and third, the regulation reserve requirement is computed by the MLR model as a function of the predicted system conditions and target CPS score. The recursive least square (RLS) method is used to update the model parameters in an online environment. Testing on a single area automatic generation control model with load and wind data from CAISO 33% Renewable Portfolio Standard scenario indicates the method outperforms methods used in the industry today.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究的是电力系统中的实时调节储备需求估计，基于NERC控制性能标准，并未涉及衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理等金融领域。
